member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) video frame parameters for frame composition. Used by the function.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS structure.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.fQueue
member.summary: TRUE if the caller is requesting queued presents; otherwise, FALSE. If TRUE, the remaining parameters must be specified. If FALSE, queued presentation is disabled for this window and present behavior returns to the default behavior.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.cRefreshStart
member.summary: A ULONGLONG value that provides the refresh number that the next presented frame should begin to display.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.cBuffer
member.summary: The number of frames the application is instructing DWM to queue. The valid range is 2-8.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.fUseSourceRate
member.summary: TRUE if the application wants DWM to schedule presentation based on source rate. FALSE if the application will decide how many refreshes to display for each frame. If TRUE, rateSource must be specified. If FALSE, cRefreshesPerFrame must be specified.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.rateSource
member.summary: The rate, in frames per second, of the source material being displayed.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.cRefreshesPerFrame
member.summary: The number of monitor refreshes through which each frame should be displayed on the screen.

member.name: DWM_PRESENT_PARAMETERS.eSampling
member.summary: The frame sampling type to use for composition.
